Question.Subject: Is there a firefox add on that can download a full episode of something from ABC.com?
Question.Content: They have full episodes and I was just wondering if there was a program or firefox add on that can download it onto my computer, thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Consequently there is no "LEGAL" add on because all episodes are copyright protected. Although there may be an "ILLEGAL" add on out there but I would not recommend trying to find one because you can go to Federal Prison. Hope this helped

Answer.Content: Consequently there is no "LEGAL" add on because all episodes are copyright protected. Although there may be an "ILLEGAL" add on out there but I would not recommend trying to find one because you can go to Federal Prison. Hope this helped
